sentences.sContent: Beer is a beverage of the remotest time.
sentences.sContent_eng: Beer is a beverage of the remotest time.
sentences.sCn: 啤酒是一种最古老的饮料。

sentences.sContent: And not only food: frequently there must be a beverage.
sentences.sContent_eng: And not only food: frequently there must be a beverage.
sentences.sCn: 而且不仅仅为了食物，还常常必须有饮料。

sentences.sContent: In this case, you want to provide the user with a way to say the desired beverage.
sentences.sContent_eng: In this case, you want to provide the user with a way to say the desired beverage.
sentences.sCn: 在这种情况下，您想为用户提供一种方法，让他们说出自己想要的饮料。

remMethod.val: b(看作bee， 蜜蜂) + ever(曾经) + age → 蜜蜂曾经酿造蜂蜜 → 蜂蜜是一种饮料 → 饮料
